author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The work of horror author Stephen King has inspired so many great films and shows over the years. Of course, it can be difficult to keep track of them all. Here’s a recommendation for one intense Stephen King adaptation you may have missed on Netflix – which was directed by none other than Mike Flanagan. [...]

The post One Of Stephen King’s Most Intense Horror Movies Is Streaming On Netflix appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: One Of Stephen King’s Most Intense Horror Movies Is Streaming On Netflix

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
In addition to introducing new superheroes and projects, the Marvel Cinematic Universe is known for its sequels, and now one long-awaited MCU sequel could finally be happening. According to a new report, Marvel is developing a follow-up to one of the franchise’s newer properties, one that fans have been clamoring for. As shared in a [...]

The post Marvel Reportedly Developing Long-Awaited MCU Sequel appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Marvel Reportedly Developing Long-Awaited MCU Sequel

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Dean Cain was one of the previous live-action actors to portray Superman, specifically appearing in the ABC series Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman from 1993 to 1997. Now, decades later, James Gunn is reinventing the character for the all-new DCU movie Superman now in theaters, and Dean Cain is rather unhappy about [...]

The post Dean Cain Says James Gunn Made Mistake Calling Superman An “Immigrant” appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Dean Cain Says James Gunn Made Mistake Calling Superman An “Immigrant”

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
It’s taken a long time for a new Red Sonja movie to get off the ground following the release of the first adaptation in 1985 at a time when Conan the Barbarian was a major hit. Now, forty years later, the first official trailer has been released for the new Red Sonja movie coming later [...]

The post ‘Red Sonja’ First Trailer With Matilda Lutz As Titular Character Released appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Red Sonja’ First Trailer With Matilda Lutz As Titular Character Released
